title: The Circle recap: Tim, Woody and Ella are on to Jack and Beth’s catfish ‘Joyce’
text:
Jack and Beth tried to fool the other contestants (Picture: Channel 4)

Things got interesting on The Circle when two former players, Beth and Jack, got to return to the show.

The big twist was that they would be catfishing the others, posing as 62-year-old Joyce.

As Jack constantly tried to crack on with Beth, the pair tried to create a backstory for her, giving her a dog called Dora and explaining that she is a widow.

Everyone was welcoming to her at first, but there were some players who weren’t sure that ‘Joyce’ was being completely up front.

Woody and Ella in particular did a bit of digging and came close to catching her out – how long can Beth and Jack keep things up.

‘Joyce’ enters the chat

Jack and Beth officially returned to The Circle as ‘Joyce’ and made a good first impression.

But they ran into their first hurdle during a quiz with the contestants being split into teams and being given questions each team member had to answer.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The final test involved them having to guess the alcoholic beverage. ‘Joyce’ didn’t guess that it was sherry, which led Woody and Tim to get suspicious.

Jack and Beth realised their blunder, but felt that they had got away with it.

Jack is pretty sure he has everyone fooled (Picture: Channel 4)

Woody goes into CSI mode

Woody and Ella decided to tag team ‘Joyce’ and try to work out if they were being catfished.

‘Joyce’ mentioned on her profile that she had been to a festival, and instead of making up an obscure event that wouldn’t get them found out, they declared ‘Joyce’ had been to Reading last year – which Woody said he was also at.

He questioned her directly about the best act she saw at Reading that year, forcing Beth and Jack to avoid the question.

Eventually the heat became too much and the duo made a swift exit from the chat, leaving Woody and Ella with more questions than answers.

Ella and Brooke have some ‘sassy’ girl time

Ella decided she wanted to be pally with Brooke and the girls had a bit of banter in a separate chat.

After finding out that he had been sliding into contestants’ DMs, they tore Jack apart, calling him a ‘f**k boy’. Poor Jack, although his attention is probably elsewhere now…

Brooke spilled the afternoon tea with Ella (Picture: Channel 4)

‘Joyce’ chooses to hang out with Tim

Beth and Jack decided that Joyce would want to send more time with Tim, as they had got it into their heads that as they are the older contestants, they would immediately fancy each other.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Their plan went up in smoke after Tim revealed that he is gay – and he threw the pair a serious curveball by asking the breed of her dog Dora.

Tim is getting suspicious (Picture: Channel 4)

Beth and Jack were stumped before eventually answering that Dora is a cockapoo.

Have they done enough to throw Tim off the scent?

The Circle airs weekdays at 10pm on Channel 4.

description: What happened last night on The Circle? Tim, Woody and Ella are on to Jack and Beth's catfish 'Joyce'
